contest-event.event-date: Sept. 26, 1925 D National Championship of Great Britain (Crystal Palace) National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) 1 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) national-finals-championship-section European Championships The current Nationals contest began in 1900, but there was a previous 'Nationals' contest run 40 years earlier: Enderby Jackson's Great National Contest. Championship Joan of Arc [Wright] Crystal Palace (Concert Hall), Crystal Palace Park, Sydenham, County of London, England, UK Prizes: 1st: 100 Pounds plus the 1000 Guinea Trophy, 2nd: 50 Pounds plus the Daily Telegraph Challenge Cup, 3rd: 30 Pounds , 4th: Silver plated cornet valued at 20 Pounds., 5th: Instrument valued at 20 Pounds., 6th: Silver plated cornet valued at 15 Guineas. 17 bands competed. Oct. 14, 2011, 5:43 p.m. Nov. 7, 2018, 1:56 p.m. 1 Marsden Colliery J. A.
